title: rest-client-reactive does not inject Providers in ClientRequestFilter
body:
### Describe the bug

https://github.com/Shohou/rest_client_reactive_inject_bug
this project demonstrates an issue. It has two branches. One is called `classic` and uses `quarkus-rest-client` and another is called `reactive` and has the only difference - changed library to `quarkus-rest-client-reactive`. Reactive branch fails to inject `Providers` to `ClientRequestFilter`

### Expected behavior

My expected behavior is that both branches work

### Actual behavior

Reactive branch fails with NPE
```
java.lang.NullPointerException: Cannot invoke "javax.ws.rs.ext.Providers.getMessageBodyWriter(java.lang.Class, java.lang.reflect.Type, java.lang.annotation.Annotation[], javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType)" because "this.providers" is null

	at org.acme.MyRemoteServiceAuthFilter.filter(MyRemoteServiceAuthFilter.java:36)
        ...
```
Exception happens in [MyRemoteServiceAuthFilter.java](https://github.com/Shohou/rest_client_reactive_inject_bug/blob/reactive/src/main/java/org/acme/MyRemoteServiceAuthFilter.java). There is an injection of `Providers` and it doesn't work for reactive case

### How to Reproduce?

Try to execute a MyRemoteServiceTest

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

quarkus 2.9.2

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
